name: RETAWATCH
description: We have been developing a social media application named RETAWATCH contatining four side applications. Users will be able to access RETAWATCH app via the infrastructure provided by a private network operating within RETAWATCH (RTW) COIN. RETAWATCH, being the main app, contains 4 side applications (RETATUBE, RETASHARE, RETAMESSAGE, RETACINEMA). Users will be able to register to all social media platforms within RTW via TrustWallet and Metamask without providing any personal information. Our aim is to provide music and TV series/movie services through private networks on a decentralized platform.
